Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String message

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
System.Exception innerException

The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the innerException parameter is not a null reference (langword_csharp_Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a langword_csharp_catch block that handles the inner exception.
